nodes.bodyText: This was supposed to be Exception instead of ReflectiveOperationException. Oops.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: I viscerally hate this. I don't even know why. I'm hoping someone smarter comes along and tells me a better solution.
Sorry I don't. Afair the @ResourceLock is the way how the JUnit Jupiter guys want's you to do.
